title: 3\*TYPE: The Future of Type
content:
Ben Greenman, author and _New Yorker_ editor, presents [a revolutionary new print technology: 3\*TYPE](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020171618/http:/www.mcsweeneys.net/2010/3/8greenman.html).

[Via [UnBeige](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020171618/http:/www.mediabistro.com/unbeige/funny/ben_greenman_introduces_3type_the_future_of_print_154359.asp).]
author: Ricardo Cordoba
